casebody.data:
CARDIORENTIS AG
v.
IQVIA LTD. and Iqvia RDS, Inc. 168A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 5, 2019 J. Dickson Phillips, III, Jonathan C. Krisko, Attorneys at Law, for Cardiorentis AG Charles F. Marshall, III, Shepard D. O'Connell, Attorneys at Law, for Iqvia Ltd. and Iqvia RDS, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 4th of June 2019 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of June 2019."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 7th day of August 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
